title: Urban Star Mens Jeans Relaxed Fit – Straight Leg Stretch Jeans for Men – Ultimate Comfort Superflex Pants
description: ULTIMATE COMFORT. Most comfortable pair of jeans you’ll ever own. And thanks to the stretch fabric, you don’t have to sacrifice shape or style to wear them. Guaranteed to become your favorite pants.

MOVE FREELY. The flexible cotton blend used in our jeans help maximize freedom of movement. Whether you’re playing sports with your kids or manning the grill, enjoy sweat-pant freedom in the form of high-quality men’s denim.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Deep pockets, reinforced stitching to ensure that belt loops and seams won’t rip, and a fail-proof brass zipper that always runs smoothly. Machine washable.
ANY OCCASION. Sturdy enough for work or play, these stretch jeans feature the timeless five-pocket styling that makes them suitable for any occasion.
